item.title: Anonymous - Linux
item.description: Overview Welcome to this walkthrough of the TryHackMe room, Anonymous . This Medium Linux room leverages anonymous access to an FTP service in order to modify a script that’s run via cron every five minutes. This gets us a user shell and, from there, we abuse a SUID binary to get ourselves a root shell. All in all, this is a fun room to accomplish and has touches of OSCP-like concepts.
